root.selectInstruct: Choose your preferred language and then select PROCEED to begin.
root.resolutionInstruct: Please ensure that the Pop-up Blocker is turned off. Best viewed at 1024x768 resolution. DO NOT use your browser's Back button. Use the Previous arrow in the menu bar to navigate to the previous screen.
